headline: A Look At Akamai Technologies (AKAM) Valuation After Softer Guidance And Rising Infrastructure Costs
summary: Following its fourth quarter earnings release, Akamai Technologies (AKAM) issued financial guidance for early 2026 that came in below market expectations, as investors focused on pressure from higher memory, infrastructure, and server costs. See our latest analysis for Akamai Technologies. The weaker 2026 guidance triggered a sharp reset in expectations, with Akamai’s 7 day share price return of 8.48% and 1 day return of 0.09% both in negative territory. However, the 90 day share price return...
